channel.title: Part 17: Requirements for Philosophers on Tao Te Ching Simplified
channel.description: Recent content in Part 17: Requirements for Philosophers on Tao Te Ching Simplified

item.title: Chapter 49: Equipoise
item.description: 1 The sage has no invariable mind of his own. He makes the mind of the people his mind. 2 I am good to those who are good to me and to those who are not good to me. Thus, all get to be good. I am sincere to those who are sincere with me and to those who are not sincere with me. Thus, all get to be sincere.
